Articles.Content:
I designed and built this plane from scratch. It's not the easiest thing to fly but it can turn and it's not restricted by lack of atmosphere so you can take it higher than conventional planes!

One amazing thing I discovered about it... it can escape solar orbit legitimately.

To get it into deep-space turn SAS on before you take-off and then fire the engines at 3/4 power. Press 1 to turn on Air Compressors, bring up the wheels and then just let it fly straight.
